gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.components
Class BPanel<T>

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.components.ButtonPanel
                      gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.components.BPanel<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of model.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
BPanelForMap, LongProcessControlPanel, LongProcessPanel, LongProcessStatusLabelsPanel, LongProcessStatusPanel, MultiThreadedLongProcessPanel, MultiThreadedLongProcessStatsPanel, SystemMonitorPanel
public class BPanel<T>
extends ButtonPanel

Panel with a model object. The panel can have components bound to the model object.
The panel is Refreshable. The default implementation of refresh() in a BPanel puts the values of its model object attributes to its model bound components.

See Also:
Serialized Form

addModelBoundButton

public BButton addModelBoundButton(java.lang.String methodName,
                                   ButtonProperties properties)
Adds a button that invokes a method of this panel.

Parameters:
methodName - Name of method that will be triggered. The same will be also the name of the new BButton that is created.
properties - Properties for the new button. Can be null.
Returns:
Returns the new button.
